title: How to Hide VLC Player Controls

steps.title: Select a video from your computer.
steps.content: Select a video from your computer.

steps.title: Open the video with VLC Player.
steps.content: Open the video with VLC Player. Right-click on the video, click Open with from the option and select VLC Media Player .

steps.title: Use the keyboard shortcut.
steps.content: Use the keyboard shortcut. Just press Ctrl + H to hide the control panel.

steps.title: Now enjoy the video without the control panel.
steps.content: Now enjoy the video without the control panel. Press Ctrl + H one more time to show the control panel. Finished!
